# Copilot Instructions for Ultra_Website

## Project Overview
This is the Ultra_Website repository. When working on this project, please follow the guidelines below.

## Code Style and Conventions
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Follow established patterns already present in the codebase
- Use descriptive variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic

## Testing
- Write tests for new functionality when test infrastructure exists
- Ensure existing tests pass before submitting changes

## Documentation
- Update relevant documentation when making changes
- Keep the README.md up to date with any new features or setup instructions

## Pull Requests
- Create focused, single-purpose changes
- Write clear commit messages that describe the change
- Include context in PR descriptions
